text.__SUMMARY__: Tillandsia hirtzii is a species of plant in the family Bromeliaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador.  Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.Sources: Manzanares, J.M. & Pitman, N. (2003). "Tillandsia hirtzii". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 2003: e.T43337A10797897. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.2003.RLTS.T43337A10797897.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
